Title: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
Description: External URL injection through URL aliases in drupal.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 7.0 before 7.60, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.6.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 7.0, all versions starting from 7.60 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.6.2
